title: HEEELLLPPPP
body:
So basically I just downloaded the game and I am trying to open it but It wont work
I see a white gray bar on the bottom of the app picture thing lel
as soon as the bar gets halfway the app just disappears plz help.

Im on Mac BTW

replies.body:
This issue often happens as a result of a few different factors. Most of the time, either network settings or missing administrative privileges causes this, so I suggest checking out [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-mac) to address this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
